DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to follow-up on patients who underwent different types of wrist surgery: 4-row arthrodesis or proximal row carpectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Follow-up of Patients After 4-row Arthrodesis or Proximal Row Carpectomy
DOC.criteria: All patients who underwent wrist surgery (4row arthrodesis or proximal row carpectomy) between 1998 and 2004
DOC.keyword: Wrist surgery: 4-corner arthrodesis or proximal row carpectomy
